articles.author: Veronika Melkozerova
articles.title: Killer Russian drone strikes Chernobyl nuclear reactor cover, Ukraine says - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: “Radiation levels inside and outside remain normal and stable,” says International Atomic Energy Agency.
articles.content:
The New Safe Confinement (NSC), as the shelter is officially known, is a mammoth structure that can withstand a tornado. It was completed to cover the fourth nuclear reactor in Chernobyl in 2016.
Ru… [+1200 chars]
